headline: Bitcoin derivatives data questions the strength of BTC’s $115K support
summary: Bitcoin traders turn cautious as BTC trades near a critical support level, but outright panic is absent in derivatives markets.

headline: Real-time crypto laundering exposes CEX vulnerabilities — Report
summary: New data shows stolen crypto is laundered within minutes, often before hacks are even disclosed.

headline: Crypto Biz: Hive’s Nasdaq moment, Citadel’s tokenization warning and Trump’s Bitcoin bull
summary: Hive Digital Technologies, the first publicly traded Bitcoin miner, marks a major milestone at Nasdaq as it accelerates its HPC expansion.
